cnd20:14.5: kahāpaṇikampi → kahāpaṇākampi (bj), khārāpatacchikampi → khārāpaṭicchikampi (mr), palālapīṭhakampi → paḷālapiṭṭhikampi (bj)
cnd20:18.2: vosaggo → vossaggo (bj, sya-all), anaṭṭhitakiriyatā → anavaṭṭhitakiriyatā (bj), abahulīkammaṃ → abahulikammaṃ (mr)
cnd20:29.5: taṇhādhipanne → taṇhāadhipanne (bj, sya-all) | taṇhāya adhipanne (mr), taṇhāya panne → taṇhāyāpanne (bj, sya-all)
